name: Strange World: RTS + Survival
description:
Waking up from cryosleep in a world unfamiliar to them, a rag-tag group of survivors ban together to escape this dangerous land in hopes of discovering the cause of a strange apocalyptic event .

Strange World is a hybrid genre game combining RTS (Real-time strategy) with survival game elements. You can control up to 4 characters simultaneously to explore, manage and scavenge while crafting various tools and weapons to survive and thrive in this dangerous world.

Game Features:

- Real Time Strategy Meets Survival

- Intuitive gesture controls allowing up to 4 characters controlled at once
- Over 30 Engaging Stages to Uncover the Mysterious Story behind Strange World
- Over 16 Different Characters with Unique Skills to choose from
- Craft dozens of weapons and tools from your mobile base to help you survive
- Offline mode

Special Developer Notes:

When our team set out to make Strange World, we drew inspiration from our fond memories of playing RTS games on our computers. We really wanted to bring that experience into mobile gaming world while incorporating survival game elements from modern mobile games. We set out an ambitious goal of creating a game that is a new form of hybrid game that wasn't widely available on the market. New systems were created to bridge that gap between PC and mobile. This included our team making dozens of prototypes to address RTS controls on mobile, the end result is an intuitive gesture control mechanic allowing the game to achieve traditional RTS-like feeling on a smartphone. We tried staying true to form of a traditional PC-based RTS games of simultaneous multi-unit controls, resource management, micro-management battle system with modern survival game elements such as item crafting and meta-game upgrades. We hope the end product is a truly unique mobile game that breaks the mould of current set mobile game genres.
